name: Is a Number (no commas, neg/pos)
description: Matches a number of any length or size. Leading "-" is optional as is deicmal portion. If a decimal exists, at least one digit must come before and after the decimal point.  Does not allow extra leading zeros (i.e. 0.5 is allowed, but not 00.5 or 0100). No commas are allowed.
author: jhazard
